japanese: これは、とっても美味しそうですね！
うん、上手にできてるね。

二乃のアドバイス通り、余熱を使って調理したから
焦げずにすんだのか。
translation:
As Nino advised,
I prepared it using residual heat,
so it didn't burn.

japanese: どれどれ～……うん、美味しい！
translation: Let me see... Wow, that's great!

japanese: ま、教師がいいから当然よね。
translation:
Well, my teacher was really good,
so it's only natural it's delicious.

japanese: あの、お代わりはありますか？
はやっ！　あんたいつの間に！？
translation: Woah, that was quick! When did you finish yours?!
